titleStmt.title: SII 4.824: original edition by H. Krishna Sastri
No. 824. (A.R. No. 11 of 1893). ON THE WEST WALL OF THE SAME PRAKARA.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . pūmeya vaḷar tiruppon mārvupuṇara nāmevu kalaimakaḷ nalam peritu ciṟappa vicaiyamāmakaḷ velpuyattiruppa Icaiyincelvi Eṇṭicai vaḷaṟpa nirupar van=tiṟaiñca niṇila maṭantaiyait tirumaṇampuṇantu tiruvaḷar tiru(m)maṇimuṭi kavittena maṇimuṭi cūṭi mallaiñālattup palluyiṟkellām Ellaiyi linpa miyalvini leyta
veṇkuṭai niḻaṟṟac ceṅkolocci vāḻi pallūḻi Āḻi naṭappac cemponvīra- simhāsanattup puvanimuḻutuṭaiyāḷoṭum vīṟṟiruntaruḷiya korājakesaripanmarāna tribhuvanacakravattikaḷ śrī kulottuṅgacoḷadevarkku yāṇṭu Iraṇṭāvatu nāḷ Eḻupattumūṉṟināl tevatānam Iṟaiyili Iṭṭamaik kuḷvariuṭaiyār tiruvekampamuṭaiyāṟku ve
ṇṭum niman=taṅkaḷukku Iṟuppatākap paḻampiyar tavirntu yāṇṭiraṇṭāvatu mutal tevatānayiṟaiyiliyiṭṭa Eyiṟkoṭṭat teyirnāṭṭu brahadeya putuppākkamāṉa kulottuṅgacoḷacaturvvedimaṅgalamaḷan=tapaṭi niṅkal nīkki Irupūviḷai nilamaṟupattonpate Eṇmāvarai yaraikkāṇi mun=tirikai Orupūviḷainilam nūṟṟirupattunālaraiye nālumā
kkāṇi mun=tirikai Āka nirnilam nūṟṟuttoṇṇūṟṟunāle mūṉṟumā Orumāvarai yaraikkāṇi mun=tirikaikku veli Oṉṟukku nellu nāṟpatiThe inscription is left unfinished.
Digital edition of SII 4.824 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
